column1: Finance and Investment MSc (DUAL Award, Greenwich and New Zealand)
column5: Studied in Greenwich and New Zealand, our unique MSc Finance and Investment (Dual Award) has a strong focus on developing the analytical skills needed in the finance industry.This 15-month course is studied from September to January at Greenwich, from February to June at Massey University, New Zealand, and then completed (July to November) at the institution of your choice. Graduates receive master's degree awards from both institutions.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
